name: Solid Carbide Drill Bit

specs.Coolant Type: External Coolant Only / No Internal Coolant
specs.Machine Setup: CNC machining center, engraving machine, precision engraving machine, lathe
specs.Extreme Hardness & Rigidity: Solid carbide construction prevents tool deflection, ensuring perfectly straight and accurate holes even at high feed rates.
specs.Extended Tool Life: Advanced AlTiN/TiAlN coating significantly reduces friction and thermal shock, outlasting standard HSS bits by 10 to 20 times in mass production.
specs.Excellent Chip Evacuation: Precision-ground spiral flutes facilitate rapid chip removal, preventing chip packing and tool breakage in blind holes.
specs.IMPORTANT: Solid carbide is incredibly hard but inherently brittle. These drill bits MUST be used in rigid, highly stable CNC machine tools or automatic lathes with proper external coolant. DO NOT use with hand drills, magnetic drills, or unstable drill presses, as any lateral movement or vibration will cause immediate tool breakage.
